parameter.name: name
parameter.description: Unique name the connection is identified by

parameter.name: connectionType
parameter.description: MongoDB connection type

parameter.name: database
parameter.description: The name of the database available in the MongoDB server.

parameter.name: connectionURI
parameter.description: The URI which can be used to create a MongoDB instance.

parameter.name: host
parameter.description: The host name of the MongoDB instance is running.

parameter.name: port
parameter.description: The port number of the MongoDB instance is running.

parameter.name: seedList
parameter.description: The list of host and port pairs of the MongoDB instances.

parameter.name: username
parameter.description: The username to authenticate the database associated with the user.

parameter.name: password
parameter.description: The password to authenticate the database associated with the user.

parameter.name: replicaSet
parameter.description: Specifies the name of the replica set, if the mongod is a member of a replica set.

parameter.name: authSource
parameter.description: Specify the database name associated with the userâ€™s credentials.

parameter.name: authMechanism
parameter.description: Specify the authentication mechanism that MongoDB will use to authenticate the connection.

parameter.name: authMechanismProperties
parameter.description: Specify properties for the specified authMechanism as a comma-separated list of colon-separated key-value pairs.

parameter.name: gssapiServiceName
parameter.description: Sets the Kerberos service name when connecting to Kerberized MongoDB instances.

parameter.name: w
parameter.description: Corresponds to the write concern w Option.

parameter.name: wtimeoutMS
parameter.description: Corresponds to the write concern wtimeout.

parameter.name: journal
parameter.description: Corresponds to the write concern j Option option.

parameter.name: maxPoolSize
parameter.description: The maximum number of connections in the connection pool. The default value is 100.

parameter.name: minPoolSize
parameter.description: The minimum number of connections in the connection pool. The default value is 0.

parameter.name: maxIdleTimeMS
parameter.description: The maximum number of milliseconds that a connection can remain idle in the pool before being removed and closed.

parameter.name: waitQueueMultiple
parameter.description: A number that is multiplied by the maxPoolSize value, to provide the max no of threads allowed to wait for a connection.

parameter.name: waitQueueTimeoutMS
parameter.description: The maximum time in milliseconds that a thread can wait for a connection.

parameter.name: ssl
parameter.description: A boolean to enable or disables TLS/SSL for the connection.

parameter.name: sslInvalidHostNamesAllowed
parameter.description: Disables hostname validation of the certificate presented by the mongod instance.

parameter.name: connectTimeoutMS
parameter.description: The time in milliseconds to attempt a connection before timing out.

parameter.name: socketTimeoutMS
parameter.description: The time in milliseconds to attempt a send or receive on a socket before the attempt times out.

parameter.name: compressors
parameter.description: comma-separated string of compressors to enable network compression for communication between the client and a mongo instance.

parameter.name: zlibCompressionLevel
parameter.description: An integer that specifies the compression level if using zlib for network compression.

parameter.name: readConcernLevel
parameter.description: The level of isolation.

parameter.name: readPreference
parameter.description: Specifies the read preferences for this connection.

parameter.name: maxStalenessSeconds
parameter.description: Specifies, in seconds, how stale a secondary can be before the client stops using it for read operations.

parameter.name: readPreferenceTags
parameter.description: Specifies the tags document as a comma-separated list of colon-separated key-value pairs.

parameter.name: localThresholdMS
parameter.description: The size (in milliseconds) of the latency window for selecting among multiple suitable MongoDB instances.

parameter.name: serverSelectionTimeoutMS
parameter.description: Specifies how long (in milliseconds) to block for server selection before throwing an exception.

parameter.name: serverSelectionTryOnce
parameter.description: Single-threaded drivers only.

parameter.name: heartbeatFrequencyMS
parameter.description: Controls when the driver checks the state of the MongoDB deployment.

parameter.name: appName
parameter.description: Specify a custom app name.

parameter.name: retryReads
parameter.description: Enables retryable reads.

parameter.name: retryWrites
parameter.description: Enable retryable writes.

parameter.name: uuidRepresentation
parameter.description: The representation to use when converting a UUID to a BSON binary value.

parameter.name: inputType
parameter.description: Connection string type that should be used to establish the connection with the MongoDB.

parameter.name: useDnsSrvLookup
parameter.description: When true, the driver uses DNS SRV records to discover the MongoDB server.
